text: George Joseph "Mike" Kelly, Jr. (born May 10, 1948), is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He has been the U.S. Representative from Pennsylvania since 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Mike Kelly official U.S. House site * Mike Kelly for Congress * * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mike Kelly (politician)
